ERI 30 WNW YNG PKB 20 W CRW 35 SSW LOZ 20 NNW HSV 40 SW TUP 40 S SHV
25 SW CLL 40 NNW HDO 10 SSE DRT ...CONT... 25 SSW 6R6 35 SE FST BGS
35 SSW LBB 30 SSW TCC 55 WSW CAO 25 SW SPD 15 N EHA 60 E LBL 40 SW
AVK 50 NNE CSM 35 E CSM ADM 15 NE DUA 15 NNW DEQ 15 ENE HOT 25 NW
BVX 15 SSE AZO FNT 55 ESE BAX.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 45 S PNS 35 NW MOB 15
